scoped_ptr.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_SCOPED_PTR_HPP_VP_2003_10_30
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_SCOPED_PTR_HPP_VP_2003_10_30
00003 
00004 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00005 # pragma once
00006 #endif
00007 
00008 //  Copyright (c) 2003 Vladimir Prus.
00009 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00010 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00011 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00012 
00013 // Provides non-intrusive serialization for boost::scoped_ptr
00014 // Does not allow to serialize scoped_ptr's to builtin types.
00015 
00016 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00017 
00018 #include <boost/scoped_ptr.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/serialization/nvp.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/serialization/split_free.hpp>
00021 
00022 namespace boost { 
00023 namespace serialization {
00024     
00025     template<class Archive, class T>
00026     void save(
00027         Archive & ar, 
00028         const boost::scoped_ptr<T> & t, 
00029         const unsigned int /* version */
00030     ){
00031         T* r = t.get();
00032         ar << boost::serialization::make_nvp("scoped_ptr", r);
00033     }
00034 
00035     template<class Archive, class T>
00036     void load(
00037         Archive & ar, 
00038         boost::scoped_ptr<T> & t, 
00039         const unsigned int /* version */
00040     ){
00041         T* r;
00042         ar >> boost::serialization::make_nvp("scoped_ptr", r);
00043         t.reset(r); 
00044     }
00045 
00046     template<class Archive, class T>
00047     void serialize(
00048         Archive& ar, 
00049         boost::scoped_ptr<T>& t, 
00050         const unsigned int version
00051     ){
00052         boost::serialization::split_free(ar, t, version);
00053     }
00054 
00055 } // namespace serialization
00056 } // namespace boost
00057 
00058 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_SCOPED_PTR_HPP_VP_2003_10_30
